SEARCH
Package me.bristermitten.mittenlib.files

Interface FileType

All Known Implementing Classes:
JSONFileType, YamlFileType
public interface FileType
A specific type of file such as JSON or YAML which can be loaded into a Map-like data structure. An instance of this class should generally only handle a single file type.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull ObjectLoader
    loader()
    Returns an ObjectLoader for this file type.
    boolean
    matches(Path path)
    If the given path matches this file type.
    @NotNull ObjectWriter
    writer()
    Returns an ObjectWriter for this file type.

  • Method Details

    • matches

      boolean matches(Path path)
      If the given path matches this file type. This is generally done by the file extension, but this is not a requirement.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to check
      Returns:
      if the path matches this file type

    • loader

      @NotNull @NotNull ObjectLoader loader()
      Returns an ObjectLoader for this file type. It should be assumed that the loader will only work (i.e. not produce an Result.fail(Exception)) for paths for which matches(Path) returns true
      Returns:
      an Object Loader for this file type

    • writer

      @NotNull @NotNull ObjectWriter writer()
      Returns an ObjectWriter for this file type.
      Returns:
      an ObjectWriter for this file type
